## Classes

### `libvirt`

Sets up libvirtd and optionally qemu-kvm and virt-install

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include libvirt
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `libvirt` class.

##### `kvm`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to install qemu-kvm or not

Default value: ``true``

##### `kvm_pkg`

Data type: `String[1]`

The name of the qemu-kvm package

Default value: `'qemu-kvm'`

##### `libvirt_pkg`

Data type: `String[1]`

The name of the libvirt package

Default value: `'libvirt'`

##### `virt_install`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to install virt-install

Default value: ``true``

##### `virt_install_pkg`

Data type: `Optional[String[1]]`

The name of the virt-install package. Default value is OS-dependent.

Default value: `$libvirt::params::virt_install_pkg`
